title: League Friends App Android
body: I downloaded the app and log on it once and just to test it out and all, didn't like so I log off and deleted it. My friends told me that I was still online league (mobile). It seems once you log in you're stuck as showing online/mobile forever. Can you please fix this... I dont even have the app anymore and this shows up. I restarted phone, change pw I have no idea how to fix this please help.

replies.body:
Hi! I'm sorry about this, we're working on a fix to make the sign out button...actually sign you out. >_>;;

Right now you will switch from "mobile" to "offline" automatically after 24 hours though, so you should not be stuck there forever.
This is a little frustraating, I play on the NA servers but because I'm from Europe I can't download it
